[1 John 3:16, 18, 19, 23; 4:8-13, 20, 21, quoted.] 
     I have quoted only a few passages, but the Bible abounds in just such lessons. If it is not possible to love God unless we love our brother, the case will certainly go against us in the courts of heaven if we do not cherish Christlike love for one another. The Word is very explicit.
